alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 22 at 8:44PM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST FRIDAY THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt and rainfall runoff continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central New York and northeast Pennsylvania, including the following areas, in central New York, Delaware, Otsego and Sullivan. In northeast Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne, Pike and Southern Wayne. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST Friday through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
